/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, teeming with cars and buses, cuts through the heart of the city, reflecting the rhythm of urban life. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades a testament to the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the scene.
